data.name: RayWallet
data.description: RayWallet is a web light wallet for Cardano. Light wallets don't need to download or synchronize the blockchain. This means that once you open the wallet, you can send or verify the transaction receipts right away.

data.name: Daedalus
data.description: The open source wallet for ada, built to grow with the Cardano blockchain. Daedalus downloads a full copy of the Cardano blockchain and independently validates every transaction in its history.

data.name: AdaLite
data.description: We are an open-source client-side interface for direct interaction with the Cardano blockchain.

data.name: Yoroi
data.description: Yoroi is a light-client wallet for Cardano and Ergo that is simple, fast and secure — your gateway to the financial world.

data.name: Nami Wallet
data.description: Nami Wallet is a browser based wallet extension to interact with the Cardano blockchain and is non-custodial. It can be used to send and store multiple assets, to delegate, to mint tokens, use multi-sigs and much more.

data.name: GeroWallet
data.description: Our mission is to create the ultimate Cardano wallet that boasts interchain and multi-chain compatibility—while providing a superior user experience through an intuitive UI. We envision a wallet that empowers individuals to access Decentralized Finance (DeFi) technology and a “swiss army knife” of features.

data.name: CardWallet
data.description: CardWallet is a next generation non-custodial wallet, with FIAT on and off ramps, as well as a full suite of DeFi capabilities.

data.name: Ellipal
data.description: Secure your Bitcoin and Cryptocurrency with the strongest, air-gapped and best cold wallet. Works seamlessly with your mobile phone.

data.name: Infinito Wallet
data.description: A safe and simple wallet for everyone. Infinito Wallet helps newcomers to seize crypto investment opportunities. Buy, invest, trade, earn, use easily.

data.name: Trezor
data.description: Trezor Wallet is an easy-to-use interface for your Trezor. Trezor Wallet allows you to easily control your funds, manage your balance and initiate transfers.

data.name: Ledger
data.description: Ledger wallets are hardware cryptocurrency wallets made by Ledger.  Ledger's hardware wallets are multicurrency wallets that are used to store private keys for cryptocurrencies offline.

data.name: Atomic Wallet
data.description: Manage your Bitcoin, Ethereum, XRP, Litecoin, XLM, and over 300 other coins and tokens.

data.name: Medusa
data.description: Medusa is a web-based Cardano Wallet, which allows you to keep your ADA and make transactions by secure and convenient way.

data.name: GameChanger
data.description: The ultimate crypto wallet experience for the Web, with native NFT and token features, powered by Cardano Blockchain and upcoming third party applications.

data.name: CCWallet
data.description: An alternative Cardano light wallet for the browser. Brought to you by TITANstaking and AHL (CNTools maintainer).

data.name: Exodus
data.description: Send, receive & exchange Bitcoin and 100+ cryptocurrencies with ease on the world's leading Desktop, Mobile and Hardware crypto wallets.

data.name: Guarda Wallet
data.description: Custody-free crypto wallet for Bitcoin, Ethereum, Tether, TRON, DeFi Tokens, Stablecoins and hundreds of other assets. Buy and exchange crypto.

data.name: RaySwap
data.description: RaySwap is an automated liquidity protocol for creating liquidity and trading native tokens on Cardano. It eliminates trusted intermediaries and unnecessary forms of rent extraction, allowing for fast, efficient trading. Where it makes tradeoffs decentralization, censorship resistance, and security are prioritized.

data.name: DeFIRE
data.description: deFIRE is the FIRST DEX aggregator built for Cardano DEXs. Powered by Changelly.

data.name: ORION
data.description: The first global and decentralized gateway to the crypto market. Access major CEX, DEX + swap pools directly from your wallet.

data.name: YaySwap
data.description: The first hybrid DEX platform on the Cardano Blockchain. Swap your tokens in an instant, completely decentralized, and open source.

data.name: SundaeSwap
data.description: The Sweetest Decentralized Exchange on Cardano.

data.name: Maladex
data.description: Comprehensive crypto decentralized exchange providing access to liquidity providing (AMM), yield farming, crypto indexes, mirrored crypto assets, derivative trading, option trading strategies structured via smart contracts, and more.

data.name: ErgoDEX
data.description: A non-custodial, decentralised exchange that allows a quick, effortless and secure transfer of liquidity between the Ergo and Cardano networks.

data.name: ADAX Pro
data.description: ADAX is an automated liquidity protocol that facilitates trades within the Cardano ecosystem in a completely decentralized and non-custodial way.

data.name: CardSwap
data.description: Cardano's Premium DEX Solution

data.name: Ardana
data.description: Ardana is a decentralized stablecoin hub which will bring the necessary DeFi primitives needed to bootstrap & maintain any economy to Cardano. Ardana offers an on-chain asset-backed stablecoin and a decentralized stable-asset DEX.

data.name: PHARO
data.description: Pharo is building a protocol for decentralized risk management products and applications. Individuals, businesses, large and small, non-profit organizations and insurtech startups can all come together to provide better products and services.

data.name: Cardax
data.description: Decentralized Exchange for the Cardano ecosystem. In Cardax anyone can become a liquidity provider and start earning CDX tokens.

data.name: Minswap
data.description: Minswap is a multi-pool decentralized exchange on Cardano. Swap tokens with minimal cost, minimal time and maximal convenience.

data.name: Fanance
data.description: Fanance Club is a Sport Player's stocks trading DEX platform build on Cardano Blockchain.

data.name: Mirqur
data.description: Pareto-optimal DEX on Cardano. Stakepool Airdrop IS LIVE! Delegate to MRQR to earn ADA and MQR.

data.name: Ray Network
data.description: We provide the whole range of blockchain solutions for Cardano: from DeFi exchange, API provisioning, light wallets, minting tools & explorers, to different SDKs that open the blockchain world to thousands of crypto-enthusiasts from all over the world. It's all about ADA DeFi finances in one place!

data.name: VyFinance
data.description: Finance is a Decentralized Finance protocol coming to Cardano Chain with a few firsts: Neural Net AutoHarvesting & HedgeFund Staking

data.name: CoinLink
data.description: MULTICHAIN DEFI ECOSYSTEM  All Defi services in one place, as simple as it gets

data.name: dcSpark
data.description: We are a product based Blockchain company focused on building critical products and solutions on top of the most promising crypto projects in the space. Our products empower our users with a great experience thanks to our domain expertise in the full Blockchain stack.

data.name: Liqwid
data.description: Liqwid is an open source, algorithmic and non-custodial interest rate protocol built for lenders, borrowers and developers.

data.name: MELD
data.description: MELD is the first DeFi, non-custodial, banking protocol. You can securely lend & borrow both crypto and fiat currencies with ease and stake your MELD tokens for APY.

data.name: AADA
data.description: Aada is a decentralized money market protocol that enables users to lend and borrow cryptocurrencies in a trustless manner. There is a wide variety of cryptocurrencies to choose from. With addition of Cardano ERC20 converter, Aada will bring must-have functionality to DeFi ecosystem.

data.name: Nexo
data.description: The leading regulated institution for digital assets, pioneer of the 1st Instant Crypto Credit Lines™ and the high-yield Earn Crypto Interest product.

data.name: Paribus
data.description: A cross-chain borrowing and lending protocol for NFTs, liquidity positions, and synthetic assets, powered by the Cardano blockchain.

data.name: RayKickstart
data.description: RayKickstart exists to help bring creative projects to life through tokenization. It allows you to create and fund your projects in minutes. A crypto-home for services, products, film, music, art, theater, games, comics, design, photography, and more.

data.name: Occam
data.description: OccamX + OccamRazer + Occelerator = Cardano's DeFi powerhouse

data.name: Cardstarter
data.description: CardStarter is a decentralized accelerator and swapping platform, connecting early stage Cardano innovators with our community of donors.

data.name: Vent
data.description: All In One Community Launchpad. The simplest way to research, apply & invest in early Cardano-Polygon projects.

data.name: Trustpad
data.description: TrustPad is a multi-chain IDO platform allowing projects to raise liquidity in a safe way. Binance, Ethereum, Cardano.

data.name: Synthesis
data.description: Synthesis.finance is a blockchain based crowdfunding platform for individuals, communities, startups and enterprises with a focus on static, hybrid and perpetual random number generator raffles.

data.name: Wrap Assets
data.description: Bring your assets onto Cardano!

data.name: Indigo Protocol
data.description: Indigo is an algorithmic, autonomous synthetics protocol for on-chain price exposure to real-world assets, built on Cardano.

data.name: Stasis
data.description: Crypto-enabler platform that provides an institutional-grade link between decentralized finance world and the off-chain market.

data.name: Djed
data.description: Djed is a stablecoin, based on algorithmic design. It uses smart contracts to ensure price stabilization, and that the coin will be useful for decentralized finance (DeFi) operations. It operates by keeping a reserve of base coins, and minting and burning stablecoins and reserve coins.

data.name: Matrixswap
data.description: Trade decentralized perpetual futures with up to 25x leverage on Polygon, Polkadot, and Cardano.

data.name: Ensuro
data.description: Ensuro bridges the gap between the desire of alternative capital of MGAs and the innovative capital sitting in DeFi.

data.name: Charli3
data.description: Cardano's Decentralized Oracle Solution.

data.name: API3
data.description: The Web3 API Economy. Create trustless applications that interact with Web APIs.

data.name: WolframAlpha
data.description: Wolfram Alpha, a major computational knowledge engine providing technology for major services such as Apple’s Siri assistant.

data.name: RayGraph
data.description: Any dAPP needs to get historical blockchain data, so RayGraph is ready to let you deploy graphql-based APIs to access historical data and websockets to directly access node ledger state. It uses automated scalable deploys to Cloudflare infrastructure.

data.name: Fluree
data.description: Crypto-secure immutable graph database with cloud-native architecture. Open-source.

data.name: Dandelion
data.description: Cardano APIs as Community Service.

data.name: Honeycomb
data.description: An API marketplace for connecting smartcontracts to high-quality external APIs from some of the world’s premier data providers.

data.name: Blockfrost
data.description: We provide an instant and scalable Cardano API for free.

data.name: Adapay
data.description: Accept ADA payments. Direct. Secure. From Anywhere. For Everyone. Apply as a merchant or a charity.

data.name: Revuto
data.description: Control your subscriptions with the first dApp on Cardano and leverage recurring payments with REVU tokens and DeFi services.

data.name: Sirin Labs
data.description: SIRIN V3™ employs a multi-layered cyber security suite which includes a behavioral-based and machine learning Intrusion Prevention System (IPS), for proactive cyber protection in real-time.

data.name: COTI
data.description: COTI is a fully encompassing “finance on the blockchain” ecosystem. It is built on DAG technology and designed to meet the challenges of traditional finance.

data.name: Celsius
data.description: Earn, borrow & pay on the blockchain. Rocket Weekly rewards on your #crypto with no fees, no lockups & no banking B.S.

data.name: Metaps+
data.description: We provide a wide range of payment services for eCommerce sites and physical stores, including credit card, convenience store payment, e-Money, and QR payment solutions, and are continuing to actively develop a variety of new fintech services.

data.name: RayData
data.description: RayData is a protocol that standardizes information written in a blockchain. The basic model is containers that are created by users, with write or read access allowed by the creator.

data.name: Atala PRISM
data.description: Atala PRISM is a decentralized identity solution that enables people to own their personal data and interact with organizations seamlessly, privately, and securely.

data.name: RayStake
data.description: Ray Network provides Cardano staking services on high-performance servers in the Cloudflare cloud. High availability, high uptime, low latency and automated infrastructure deployment allow for the highest possible ROI.

data.name: Cardence
data.description: Cardano focused multi-chain decentralized presale platform, an IDO platform, an incubator and accelerator.

data.name: Gada
data.description: Gada is a permissionless and community-governed launchpad for Cardano

data.name: Cardaswap
data.description: Swap, Earn And Build On The Next-Gen DEX On The Cardano Blockchain Trade, Bridge And Become A Liquidity Provider In A Financial Marketplace That Is Open And Accessible To All.

data.name: nut.link
data.description: 1st generation Cardano oracles, connecting your nuts to squirrels since epoch 228

data.name: Tokhun
data.description: #1 Cardano NFT & FT Marketplace

data.name: Pavia
data.description: Create, explore and trade in the first-ever Cardano virtual world owned by its users.
